cinemas_list.title: Cinemas
empty_movies_body: Unfortunately, nothing was found for your search
empty_movies_today: Unfortunately, nothing was found for today
empty_movies_date: Unfortunately, nothing was found for selected date
empty_movies_tomorrow: Unfortunately, nothing was found for tomorrow
enter_movie_name: Enter the name of the movie
empty_seances_body: Sorry, we haven't received the timetable yet
scan_qr: Scan QR-code at the entrance of the hall
empty_food: Here will be your cart with food
cancel_booking_alert: Are you sure you want to stop buying a ticket?
remove_ticket_alert: Are you sure you want to remove ticket?
return_ticket_alert: Are you sure you want to return ticket?
return_ticket_alert_desc:
Please be advised that if tickets are returned more than an hour before the start of the session, the service charge is 20%, less than an hour before the start of the session - 30%. From the moment the session starts, tickets are non-refundable. 
Partial return of the law is not possible.
fill_phone_and_email: Please fill E-mail and Phone number
invalid_email_address: Oops! Your email address doesn't match the standard format. Please check it and try again.
can_not_create_order: Oops, it seems someone has already taken these places before you. Please select other places. Sorry for the inconvenience
booking_unavailable: Unfortunately, online ticket purchase is currently not available. Try again later or buy tickets at the cinema box office. We are sorry for the inconvenience!
payment_failure: An unexpected error has occurred. Your purchase has not been completed. Please contact our Technical Support.
name: Name
payment_time_expired: Unfortunately, the time to buy a ticket has expired.Your selected seats have been reset. Sorry. Now you will be redirected to the home page.
payment_something_went_wrong:
Something went wrong.
Please, book again.
maintenance_text: We're currently undergoing technical maintenance on our server. We apologize for any inconvenience. We'll notify you as soon as everything is up and running!
notification_description: Do you want to receive notifications about new products and promotions in our cinema? This will help you stay up to date with the latest news and special offers.
alert_more_than_10_seats: You can buy a maximum of 10 tickets. For more than 10 tickets, please re-purchase.
order_food_description: You can buy food online through the site. Choose whatever you want without rushing and queuing, and also get a discount on certain products. And if your session is in the VIP room, then we will deliver you food directly to the room for free.
status.all_tickets_saved_in_my_tickets:
All tickets are stored in the 
'My purchases tab'
seance_is_kaz: The film is shown in Kazakh language
seance_is_eng: The film is shown in English language
seance_is_after_22:00: According to the law 'On the Rights of the Child in the Republic of Kazakhstan', for evening sessions, mainly to the films that end after 22:00, as well as sessions with an age limit of +18, persons under 18 are allowed to enter only if accompanied by parents or other legal representatives.
